硻字的基本解释

硻
kēng
古同“铿”，金石声，
击石声。

硻
kěng
刚。

硻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kēng］
［《廣韻》口莖切，平耕，溪。］
形容声音由铿锵有力渐趋微弱。

硻字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　硻； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页831第20
【唐韻】口莖切【集韻】丘耕切，?音鏗。【說文】餘堅也。从石，堅省。　又【集韻】苦杏切，音伉。剛也。　【正字通】與硜同。

硻字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
硻字的起名意思

暂无。

obstinate

obstinate
kēng
Gu Tong "Keng", Jinshisheng,
The sound of hitting the stone.
obstinate

just.
obstinate
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kēng］
["Guangyun" Cut the mouth and stem, plow, and stream. ]
Describes that the voice has gradually become weaker from sonorous and powerful.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Stone Character Department] 　硻; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 831 20
[Tang Yun] Cut the mouth and stem [Ji Yun] Qiu Geng cut,? Yin Keng. [Said the text] Yu Jian also. From the stone, Jian province.　 [Ji Yun] bitter apricot cut, sound tong. Just too.　【Zhengzitong】Same as 硁.
